Art. 4.174. 
Revocation for ingratitude 
A gift can be revoked for ingratitude only in the following 
cases: 
1¡ if the donee has made an attempt on the life of the donor; 
2¡ if he has been guilty of abuse, offences or serious insults towards him; 
3¡ if he refuses him maintenance.
Donations in favour of marriage are not revocable on grounds of ingratitude.
